About Oceanfront Pressure Pros

At Oceanfront Pressure Pros, we specialize in bringing coastal homes and businesses back to life with professional pressure washing services that make a lasting difference. Located right here along the beautiful North Carolina coast, we know the unique challenges salt air, sand, and ocean weather bring to your property — and we have the tools, skills, and expertise to tackle them head-on.

From house washing and driveway cleaning to decks, fences, patios, pool areas, and commercial storefronts, we deliver results that not only improve curb appeal but also protect and extend the life of your surfaces. We take pride in doing the job right the first time, using safe, effective cleaning techniques that restore without causing damage.

As an active-duty U.S. Marine–owned business, we bring the same discipline, attention to detail, and commitment to excellence to every job we take on. Our mission is simple: give our customers a clean, refreshed property they can be proud of — with friendly service, honest pricing, and results you can see immediately.

Whether you're a homeowner looking to freshen up your exterior or a business owner needing a professional image, Oceanfront Pressure Pros is here to serve you.

📞 Call or text 586-612-7380 today for your free estimate!

🌊

Coastal Expertise

We understand the unique challenges of coastal properties and use specialized techniques to protect your surfaces.

🎯

First-Time Quality

We take pride in doing the job right the first time, using safe, effective cleaning techniques that restore without causing damage.
